alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, northeastern Gwinnett, south central Hall and west central Jackson Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1124 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Sugar Hill to near Braselton, and moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Jefferson, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Carl, Talmo, Rest Haven, Candler, County Line, Thompsons Mill, Chateau Elan, Chestnut Mountain and Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
